title: "Cyborg Art Hub"
content:
Welcome to Cyborg Art Hub! ðŸ¤–ðŸ’»

Our website is a hub for all things cyborg-related. We showcase artwork, photography, and designs featuring cyborgs from all over the world. Our goal is to provide a platform for artists to share their unique visions of what it means to be a cyborg.

Whether you're a fan of science fiction, technology, or just love the aesthetic of metallic bodies and glowing eyes, you'll find something that speaks to you here. Our collection includes everything from detailed illustrations to abstract interpretations of the cyborg concept.

We also feature interviews with artists and creators who are pushing the boundaries of cyborg art. Learn more about their inspiration, techniques, and creative process in our exclusive interviews.

Join our community of cyborg enthusiasts and explore the endless possibilities of this fascinating concept.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An illustration of a cyborg with a metallic body and glowing eyes"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
